alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Lexington; Richland (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 4:03AM EST until December 19 at 5:36AM EST by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in South Carolina... Congaree River At Carolina Eastman affecting Calhoun, Lexington and Richland Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Carolina... Congaree River At Congaree National Park-Gadsden affecting Calhoun and Richland Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Congaree River At Carolina Eastman. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 115.0 feet, Flooding occurs in low lying areas of the Carolina Eastman Facility and at the Congaree National Park. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:00 AM EST Sunday the stage was 115.7 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 4:00 AM EST Sunday was 117.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early this morning and continue falling to 107.6 feet Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 115.0 feet. - http://www.floodsafety.noaa.gov &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
